description: A simple, playable Yatzy dice game that runs in the browser. Single player, clean UI, vanilla JS.

userStories.title: Dice Display
acceptanceCriteria: 5 dice rendered visually showing dots pattern
Dice are clearly visible and styled
userStories.notes: Use CSS for dice dots, not images

userStories.title: Roll Dice
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking roll randomizes all unheld dice
Roll button disabled when no rolls left
userStories.notes: Track rolls remaining in game state

userStories.title: Hold Dice
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a die toggles hold state
Held dice visually distinct with highlight
Held dice don't change on roll

userStories.title: Scorecard Display
acceptanceCriteria: Lower section: Three of a Kind, Four of a Kind, Full House, Small Straight, Large Straight, Yahtzee, Chance
Shows potential score for each unfilled category
Shows locked scores for filled categories

userStories.title: Score Selection
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking an available category scores it
userStories.notes: This completes the core game loop

userStories.title: Score Calculation
acceptanceCriteria: Upper section: sum of matching dice
Three of a Kind: sum of all dice if 3+ match
Four of a Kind: sum of all dice if 4+ match

userStories.title: Game End
acceptanceCriteria: Game detects when all 13 categories filled
